import React from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; const ProcessSection: React.FC = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); const steps = [ { number: "01", title: t('process.steps.discovery.title'), description: t('process.steps.discovery.description'), duration: t('process.steps.discovery.duration'), icon: ( ) }, { number: "02", title: t('process.steps.design.title'), description: t('process.steps.design.description'), duration: t('process.steps.design.duration'), icon: ( ) }, { number: "03", title: t('process.steps.development.title'), description: t('process.steps.development.description'), duration: t('process.steps.development.duration'), icon: ( ) }, { number: "04", title: t('process.steps.testing.title'), description: t('process.steps.testing.description'), duration: t('process.steps.testing.duration'), icon: ( ) }, { number: "05", title: t('process.steps.launch.title'), description: t('process.steps.launch.description'), duration: t('process.steps.launch.duration'), icon: ( ) } ]; return (

{t('process.title')}

{t('process.subtitle')}

{steps.map((step, index) => (
{step.icon}
{step.number}

{step.title}

{step.description}

{step.duration}
{index < steps.length - 1 && (
)}
))}

{t('process.cta.title')}

{t('process.cta.subtitle')}

{t('process.cta.choosePackage')} {t('process.cta.scheduleConsultation')}
); }; export default ProcessSection;
